## My office and home locations

```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(lat = c(4.7056180,4.6621920),
                 lng = c(-74.059124,-74.0565200))

wps <- c(
  "<a href='http://www.finac.com'>Office</a>",
  "<a>Home</a>"
)

#hopkinsLatLong %>%

df %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(, popup = wps)
```
